Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Izhar (יִצְהָר) descendant of Kohath (קֳהָת) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► opponent of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) ancestor of Korahite (קָרְחִי) clan
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to restore the fortunes (of a nation)
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group
= causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
literally: to bear; hence: = action by which humans or deities let go of any anger or resentment with regard to the wrongdoing or sin of (other) humans
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
literally: to cover; hence: = action by which humans or deities no longer hold (other) humans responsible for certain actions
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= action by which someone brings an event to an end

Node.gloss: to turn back from|to give up|to retire from
Node.definition: literally: to turn (from an activity); hence: = action by which humans or deities stop being engaged in a certain activity
literally: kindling of anger; hence: = process by which the anger (אַף) of deities is aroused ◄ like a fire that is kindled
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
literally: to bring back; hence: = causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state
= state in which human experience displeasure, which is said to reside in their heart (לֵב) ◄ and is caused by their own condition or by someone else
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= process by which deities or humans experience an emotion of anger; ◄ caused by someone else's behavior ► almost invariably resulting in punishment for the party that is responsible, and almost exclusively used with God as the subject
= causative action by which deities cause a certain situation to last longer
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= to cause to be healthy, strong, and/or prosperous
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans to perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= someone who practices חֶסֶד, who is committed towards fulfilling his/her obligations; these may be obligations defined within the context of a covenant or agreement, or moral obligations to do well to someone who did well to you before
literally: to turn (back) to (an activity); hence: = action by which humans engage in an activity; in most cases this is an activity in which they were engaged before
= state in which humans lack wisdom, ◄ possibly due to overconfidence, ► which can manifest itself, among other things, in relying on wealth rather than on God
= particle marking a constituent as prominent, as if limiting the focus to a restricted number of entities
= state in which humans experience fear
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

= action with which a person touches her or his lips to another person (usually on the lips or cheek or hand) or to an object ► to show love or respect or devotion; also used when greeting and saying goodbye
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to sprout|to come up|to spring up
Node.definition: = process by which plants, trees, or hairs come up and start growing; ≈ sometimes extended to denote the coming in existence of people, conditions, or activities

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= general term for plants that are sources of food; ≈ a sign of God's blessing

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= process by which events take place, ◄ as if they move like objects
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen ◄ as if it were an object placed in a certain position

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

literally: footstep, used exclusively in a figurative way to denote part of one's journey through life; hence: = something that is being done and, when God is the agent, something that other people ought to do as well; at the same time one can easily slip and fall, which is a metaphor for failure
